mapper.insert: INSERT INTO festival (festival_id, festival_name, location, start_at, end_at, festival_content, main_corp, open_corp, support_corp, tel_number, website, related_info, road_address, lot_address, latitude, longitude, update_at, provider_code, provider_name, festival_img_url) VALUES (#{festivalId}, #{festivalName}, #{location}, #{startAt}, #{endAt}, #{festivalContent}, #{mainCorp}, #{openCorp}, #{supportCorp}, #{telNumber}, #{website}, #{relatedInfo}, #{roadAddress}, #{lotAddress}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{updateAt}, #{providerCode}, #{providerName}, #{festivalImgUrl})
